scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: pnpm run test:vanilla && pnpm run test:react && pnpm run test:react-ecs && pnpm run test:phaser && pnpm run test:threejs
scripts.test:phaser: dist/cli.js test-project --template phaser && shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:react: dist/cli.js test-project --template react && shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:react-ecs: dist/cli.js test-project --template react-ecs && shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:threejs: dist/cli.js test-project --template threejs && shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:vanilla: dist/cli.js test-project --template vanilla && shx rm -rf test-project
